description: This file defines a UI component called 'Loader' using the LightningJS framework. The component renders three animated circles that cycle their opacity to create a loading indicator.

classes.name: Loader
classes.description: A LightningJS UI component representing a loading spinner with animated circles.

methods.name: start
methods.description: Initiates an interval that toggles the alpha value of the circles to create a fade-in and fade-out effect.
